notes: One passenger transported one kilometre (1,000 person-metre).
One gigabyte stored for 30 days (approximate month).
One active light-industrial construction site operating for a standard 8-hour shift.
One square foot sustained for 30 days (~0.0929 m² × 30 days).
One metric tonne equal to 1,000 kilograms.
One million British thermal units expressed in joules.
One wear of a clothing item
One metric tonne transported one kilometre (1,000 kg × 1,000 m)
One calendar year expressed in seconds
One kilogram of food refrigerated for one year (kg·year)
One square metre of floor area sustained for one year (m²·year)
